abstract: A entertaining interactive Web site takes a crafty -- and spooky -- approach to play on people's fears about privacy and social media.
snippet: A entertaining interactive Web site takes a crafty -- and spooky -- approach to play on people's fears about privacy and social media.
lead_paragraph: 4:10 p.m. | Updated Adding some details on the origin of the site and interview with its creator.

headline.main: Mysterious Site Creates a Horror Movie, Starring You
